content: simply knit one row and purl one row before continuing with the heel flap pattern as usual first knit the first 28 32 36 40 sts these sts make up the front sts of your sock which forms the top instep of the foot to create a contrasting heel cut your mc here join your cc and knit the remaining back sts these sts include the heel flap and create the underside and back of the sock now continue working back and forth only one the back half sts following the heel flap pattern instructions row 2 ws purl all sts turn work row 3 rs k2 *sl 1wyib k1* to the end turn work row 4 ws sl1p wyif purl all sts to the end turn work row 5 rs *sl1p wyib k1* turn work serenityxknits 4 knitting in serenity repeat row 4 and 5 until your heel flap measures your desired length ending with a rs row _____________________________________________________________________________ heel turn the ssk/p2tog „decreases the gap row 1 ws sl1p wyif p14 16 18 20 p2tog p1 turn work row 2 rs sl1p wyib k3 ssk k1 turn work p a row 3 ws sl1p wyif k to one st before gap ssk k1 g turn work row 4 rs sl1p wyib p to one st before the gap p2tog p1 turn work repeat row 3 and 4 until all of your heel sts have been worked ending with a rs you should now have 16 18 20 22 sts on your needle _______________________________________________________________________________________ gusset it s time to pick up sts along both sides of the heel flap to shape the gusset knit across the heel sts cut the cc and switch back to the mc pick up and knit 14 16 18 20 sts along the left side of the heel flap knit the next 28 32 36 40 sts across the front sts of the sock place a marker then pick up and knit 14 16 18 20 along the right side of the heel flap knit across the 16 18 20 22 heels sts and finally knit the 14 16 18 20 picked-up sts on the left side of the gusset you are now at the bor at this point the structure of your sock should look like this i n s r front stitches the 28 32 36 40 sts e t o p b which you knit across the instep of the foot s t s back stitches the 44 50 56 62 sts which include the heel flap sts and the gusset sts h picked up on each side gusset sts e e l s t your total stitch count should now be 72 82 s 92 102 sts to work in magic loop divide the sts evenly place 36 41 46 51 sts on each needle ________________________________________________________________________ gusset decreases now you ll work the gusset decreases these decreases taper the sock s sides providing a comfortable fit around your instep once
